settings.title: Hydration is the foundation of health.
settings.content: But science shows that staying hydrated often requires more than water alone.

settings.title: You’re probably dehydrated. It’s okay, 75% of Americans are, too.
settings.title_left: And water alone is not enough.
settings.content_left:
We think the solution to dehydration is simply drinking more water, but science shows that staying hydrated often requires more than water alone.

Without essential electrolytes like sodium and potassium, we can’t replenish ourselves adequately from everyday life: exercise, travel, late nights or illness.

Replacing electrlytes is the key to hydration. And Cure makes it easy.

settings.title: Backed by Science
settings.content:
Based on the World Health Organization’s gold standard of rehydration, known as Oral Rehydration Solution, each packet of Cure contains electrolytes and glucose to facilitate rapid hydration directly into your bloodstream. ORS is as effective as an IV drip, but way more convenient.

Since its inception, ORS has saved over 50 million lives from severe dehydration around the world.

settings.title: Powered by Nature
settings.content: Unlike the sugary, fluorescent-blue sports drinks from your past, Cure's Hydrating Electrolyte Mix was formulated for effective hydration without all the junk. Our plant-based formula has 4x the electrolytes of leading sports drinks and is made with real ingredients like coconut water and pink Himalayan salt. No added sugar or anything artificial, just natural fruit flavors you'll love to drink. Science has never tasted this good.

settings.title: Coconut Water
settings.content: Nature’s source of potassium (4x bananas and 8-10x sports drinks). Contains glucose, antioxidants, and other nutrients.

settings.title: Pink Himalayan Salt
settings.content: Nature's natural source of sodium, which is a major electrolyte and imperative for proper hydration. Pink Himalayan Salt is premium, unrefined and contains 72 trace minerals not found in table salt.

settings.title: Non-GMO Citric Acid
settings.content: Used for added flavor and naturally found in citrus fruits. Ours is from cassava root.

settings.title: Sodium Citrate
settings.content: Sodium from citric acid. Derived from cassava root. Used for function and balanced taste.

settings.title: Organic Stevia Extract
settings.content: Plant-based, organic sweetener with no sugar or calories. Despite the common misconception, stevia is not an artificial sweetener. Used with monk fruit so that there is no bitter aftertaste.

settings.title: Monk Fruit Extract
settings.content: A vine-riped fruit native to Asia that helps round out the flavor. Used with organic stevia extract so that there is no bitter aftertaste.

settings.title: Fruit Juice Powder & Organic Flavors
settings.content: Added for taste and preference, so there is a delicious Cure flavor for everyone.

settings.title: Made with Real Ingredients.
settings.description: Sports drinks are full of added sugar and artificial ingredients. Cure is made with premium and plant-based ingredients and mixed into tasty perfection.

settings.title: NO Added Sugars
settings.content: Refined sugars are used by food manufacturers to increase flavor, but don’t have vitamins and minerals found in natural sources of sugar.

settings.title: NO Artificial Sweeteners
settings.content: We never use artificial sweeteners including sucralose, saccharin, aspartame, acesulfame potassium, and neotame in our products.

settings.title: NO Sugar Alcohols
settings.content: We never use sugar alcohols including erythritol, glycerol, isomalt, lactitol, maltitol, mannitol, sorbitol or xylitol in our products.

settings.title: NO Artificial Flavors or Colors
settings.content: We never use artificial flavors or colors in our products.

settings.title: Hydrating Electrolyte Mix
settings.chart_c1r4_label: Perfectly balanced electrolytes and plant-based ingredients
settings.chart_c2r4_label: Added sugar, low in electrolytes, and made with artificial ingredients
settings.chart_c3r4_label: Unbalanced electrolytes (low sodium, high sugar and potassium)
